titles.title: A bill to limit the amount of official funds available to a Member of Congress for the purchase of postage stamps to $100 for each calendar year.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 1/7/1987--Introduced. Limits the amount of official funds available to a Member of Congress for the purchase of postage stamps to $100 for each calendar year. Requires deposit of any amount of such funds not used in the calendar year in the Treasury as miscellaneous receipts.
